Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Park's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]:
At some point in the apocalypse, Park joined a community called the 
Alexandria Safe Zone
.
As 
the Wolves
 invade Alexandria, ransacking homes and murdering residents, Park attempts to flee to safety. However, a Wolf armed with a spear ambushes Park and stabs him in the chest, killing him.
The next day, Park's body is gathered by 
Tobin
 and 
Bruce
 and buried along with the other slain Alexandrians. His name is then added to the memorial wall by 
Betsy
 and two other 
women
.
Death[]:
Killed By
Aaron
 
(Indirectly Caused)
Aaron leaves his backpack at Del Arno Foods, which causes the Wolves to locate and attack Alexandria.
The Wolves
As the Wolves make their way into Alexandria, Park is one of the many residents to be killed by a Wolf.

Trivia[]:
The names written on the memory wall correspond to the filming of each death scene in "JSS." Because of this, Bayland Rippenkroeger's character is Park.


Park's actor Bayland Rippenkroeger also had a role as a Wolf during "
JSS
".
